getAuthorizedUsername

String getAuthorizedUsername()
                             throws NotAuthorizedError
Returns username of currenlty logged in user. If no user is logged in then NotAuthorizedError is thrown

Returns:
Throws:
NotAuthorizedError - if there is no logged in user
